text: If you haven’t had a chance to sign up online for my Tele Town Hall on the #COVID19 public health crisis, you can call in directly at 855-962-1081 TODAY AT 4PM. #PA17

REMINDER: Today at 4pm I’m hosting a Tele Town Hall for #PA17 & will be joined by @ACE_Fitzgerald & @HealthAllegheny Director Dr. Debra Bogen to answer your questions about the #COVID19 public health crisis. Click here to sign up: https://t.co/9MgFzCQmWf

Tomorrow (Monday, 4/6) at 4pm, I’m hosting a Tele Town Hall for #PA17 & will be joined by @ACE_Fitzgerald & @HealthAllegheny Director Dr. Debra Bogen to provide updates & answer your questions about the #COVID19 public health crisis. Click here to sign up: https://t.co/9MgFzCyLxF

Important update for seniors in #PA17. Social Security recipients do NOT need to file anything to receive your $1200 direct cash payment from the government. Click for more info: https://t.co/CHNt2djJR8

The #Census2020 is critical to determining how resources get allocated to communities across #PA17.  It’s safe, simple and important. Learn more at https://t.co/6vP1MaXxHU & fill out your questionnaire today.

Congress has taken action to help workers, small biz, hospitals & first responders confronting the #COVID19 crisis. Visit my website for info & answers to FAQ to help understand what it all means for you. #PA17 https://t.co/Px7ZO0Aw4f
Today Congress passed the bipartisan #CARESAct to provide $2 trillion to working families, small businesses & frontline workers to address the #COVID19 pandemic #PA17 https://t.co/yuPeDbcGrc
Today I spoke on the House Floor to support the bipartisan CARES Act which provides emergency relief to all Americans during this public health crisis. #PA17 https://t.co/K4Wkt9j4wo

Congress must act to get protective equipment for our healthcare workers & first responders on the frontlines of this pandemic. There is no time to waste, they need our help now. #PA17 https://t.co/V3lEUaeGgo

Important info from federal, state & local agencies & organizations on the #COVID19 response & resources available on my website, we will update regularly as the situation evolves. Read my latest newsletter for information & links: https://t.co/rbaY9iU0kV #PA17

The President has signed bipartisan legislation to help families w/ sick leave, provide tax credits for employers, increase funding for Medicaid & ensure free #COVID19 tests. We have more to do, especially for workers & small businesses during this public health emergency. #PA17

We all need to do our part to limit the spread of #COVID19.  Starting tomorrow my #PA17 office locations are indefinitely closed to the public. My staff will telework & serve constituents virtually, answering calls & voicemails, emails & online requests. https://t.co/mhkLpTZW2o

The bipartisan legislation I voted to pass last night was an important step in our national response to this health emergency but we still have a lot of work to do to ease the burden of this pandemic on families. Read my full statement here: https://t.co/rBrL6U4QtH #PA17
Closely monitoring the #COVID19 situation & following all guidance recommended by @CDCgov. Click here for updates including Capitol & White House Tour closure info: https://t.co/faOVRfgUmd #PA17

I urge my colleagues in the Senate to join @SenJackReed & give this bill swift passage so not a single  eligible disabled veteran in America should be forced to live under the weight of student loan debt. #PA17 https://t.co/RWukgDcYXj

I introduced the FREED Vets Act (H.R. 3598) which passed the House today with bipartisan support & will give many disabled veterans automatic student loan debt relief. No veteran should be denied the relief they earned through sacrifice & service. #PA17 https://t.co/ILBA2MPUqL

Western PA has been a leader providing clean electricity through nuclear power at places like Beaver Valley & Westinghouse. The bipartisan Nuclear Energy Research And Development Act will help us save today’s jobs & create more for tomorrow. #PA17 https://t.co/hs1pDSEiy3

Visited with the residents & caregivers at @VincentianPGH today to hear about how they are dealing with #COVID19 & how we can work together to reduce the risk of spread among the senior community. For more resources & information click here: https://t.co/lk3tNe4Hja #PA17 https://t.co/BPMiDPBUsf
Full house this AM for the Bipartisan Steel Caucus “State of Steel” Hearing to discuss the importance of the steel industry & steel jobs to our economy.  #PA17 https://t.co/EfSZQJmdaM

Today the House passed a bipartisan coronavirus measure to provide $8.3 billion in funding for research & development of a vaccine & support for the local & state public health agencies protecting our communities. #PA17 https://t.co/N7ApR1SN3k

It is important to have accurate information as we learn more about #COVID19 and steps we can all take to reduce our risk. My latest newsletter has resources & information to help you stay informed: https://t.co/OCZtCzT1Lm #PA17
The US-Israel relationship has strong bipartisan support in Congress. Great to see so many Pittsburgh friends in Washington for @AIPAC #AIPAC2020 #PA17 https://t.co/n0DhMglKSM
If you’re looking for up-to-date information on #COVID19, including preparedness measures, take a look at this resource from @CDCgov: https://t.co/WP4KWMiSKo #PA17 https://t.co/aEM2yxWQA1

In #PA17 we know how important it is to care for our seniors, that means protecting Social Security & Medicare. As a cosponsor of the Older Americans Bill of Rights, I will work to ensure Congress always addresses the challenges older Americans face. https://t.co/MCQh0ePEeU

This week I urged @SecWilkie to ensure that the health of our Vietnam era veterans exposed to #AgentOrange is a top @DeptVetAffairs priority.  We owe these veterans that much, and time is running out. #PA17 https://t.co/66RuwM0KR7

The bipartisan POWER Act I introduced has been included in the Bipartisan Opioid Task Force 2020 Legislative Agenda. This legislation provides law enforcement officers on the front lines of the opioid crisis with on-the-scene drug screening devices. #PA17 https://t.co/eiNntwW58X https://t.co/YYFpBxzBb2

We have great public schools across #PA17!  I’m working in Washington to make sure our teachers & schools have the funding & support they need to create learning environments where all kids can succeed.  #PublicSchoolsWeek https://t.co/7hyv9FV5gq

This week we’re hosting mobile office hours in Aliquippa (2/27 at B.F. Jones Memorial Library) & in the North Hills (2/28 at @northlandlib) from 10a-3pm. My Penn Hills office is now open as well (11 Duff Road). We offer assistance on issues related to federal agencies in #PA17. https://t.co/7hhkgOMLqM
Thanks to everyone who stopped by my new Penn Hills District Office open house today. We look forward to serving you. #PA17 https://t.co/7diPo5wb7g
Getting my new Penn Hills District Office ready for the open house tomorrow. Looking forward to seeing you from 11a-1p at 11 Duff Road, Pittsburgh 15235. #PA17 https://t.co/f8hmO3AzNX
Thanks to Phyllis and her crew of volunteers who held a great lunch for local veterans today at the @PennHillsMuni Senior Service Center. #PA17 https://t.co/901PwJdMoA

The @fema #Firefighter grant program is now open & accepting applications for multiple programs through Friday, 3/13 at 5pm. These grants can provide critical tools & assistance to #PA17 emergency responders. Click here to learn more: https://t.co/LGg6G3Lf91
Thanks to @jkleinfc & the AP Government students @FCASD High School for a great conversation today. #PA17 https://t.co/QLFyphE3Vc

Thanks to the #PA17 winners of the 2019 @CongressionalAC today for the demo of their “Mathias” app, & to the Robotics class @shady_side for the tour of your new Glimcher Tech & Design Hub. https://t.co/N9Buo7H35C

REMINDER. Hope you can join me for an open house to check out our new Penn Hills District Office at 11 Duff Road, Pittsburgh 15235 this Saturday, 2/22 from 11a-1p. #PA17 https://t.co/vjUh1BUhmz https://t.co/3DW0szE1qh

Met Mr. Russell Hamler today to learn about the harrowing journey he encountered as part of an all-volunteer force to fight in the jungles of Burma during WWII. As a cosponsor of H.R. 906, I want to ensure “Merrill’s Marauders” get the recognition they earned & deserve. #PA17 https://t.co/Kty1Gbp7sO

We’re getting ready to open our new Penn Hills District Office at 11 Duff Road, Pittsburgh 15235.  Join me on Saturday, 2/22 from 11a-1p for our open house.  Hope to see you! #PA17 https://t.co/98nvpnICM9 https://t.co/1cFnm3oEsn

We have a responsibility to every Vietnam era veteran who faced Agent Orange exposure. The President must take action now to ensure these veterans get the VA care they need, there is no time to waste. #PA17 @VetAffairsDems https://t.co/raDr527Rh1

The Grid Modernization Act, a bipartisan bill I introduced with @HerreraBeutler, passed out of @HouseScience  today. One step closer to expanding vital research programs at @ENERGY to modernize & secure our nation’s electric grid. #PA17 https://t.co/sMRDfKqEhb https://t.co/D1ktYkASY5

The bipartisan Supporting Veterans in STEM Careers Act that I led with @DrNealDunnFL2 was signed into law by the president & will provide critical training for veterans to work in high demand STEM careers. #PA17 https://t.co/u7IVaRnaql

With bipartisan support we have been able to prioritize rebuilding the Upper Ohio Navigation system including the Montgomery Lock to create & retain thousands of good jobs in #PA17. https://t.co/fQqsMJSD2D

Read my latest newsletter to get information about the upcoming 2020 Census & my new Penn Hills office opening soon. Make sure to visit my website to sign up to receive my newsletters via email in the future. #PA17 https://t.co/cAxS823HZI

Today we passed the first bipartisan bill in generations to reform our labor laws and protect and expand workers’ rights to organize, bargain collectively, and ensure they’re treated with the respect and dignity they deserve. #PROAct #PA17 https://t.co/9IwLHQoxYp

Met some Arizona copper miners yesterday, @steelworkers members who’ve been on strike for 100+ days — & still came all the way to DC to help pass the #PROAct.

Told me USW in Pittsburgh has been really supportive throughout, & said they’re all Steelers fans.

Solidarity. #PA17 https://t.co/rk84fHW8zZ
Great to see my friends Herb & Angel Bailey in Washington today to learn more about the work they are doing in Aliquippa @UCGcafe. #PA17 https://t.co/skclaq02Kb
My #SOTU guest is @WillAttig of @unionveterans @AFLCIO who support the 1.2 million veteran workers across America, including those in #PA17. https://t.co/KAOxPd45Cp

Congress passed the “Supporting Veterans in STEM Careers Act" which now heads to the President. Veterans are some of the best workers & can help meet the growing demand for technical jobs many employers struggle to fill. #PA17 https://t.co/jwno9dOx7u
On the 75th anniversary of the liberation of Auschwitz we remember the millions of innocent lives lost during the Holocaust & know there is still work to do to fight anti-Semitism around the world.
Thanks to everyone who came out to my Town Hall today & to @MTLSD for hosting. #PA17 https://t.co/nsexEQdPh2

REMINDER  that  my next Town Hall is coming up this Saturday (1/25) at 12pm in the Auditorium at @MTLSD High School. Enter through doors A-2 located off of Cochran Road. #PA17 https://t.co/WFUKnY44gS https://t.co/6szZgLeaXi

My office is hosting mobile office hours this week in Aliquippa (1/23 at the B.F. Jones Memorial Library) & in the North Hills (@northlandlib on Friday, 1/24) from 10a-3pm. We can assist with issues related to federal agencies such as @IRSnews, @DeptVetAffairs & @USPS. #PA17 https://t.co/KIt3KsfaQq
The spirit of Dr. King is alive in all who remain committed to his dream of peace & justice. #MLKDay #PA17 https://t.co/RK4WPYWLkn

Check out my latest newsletter for information on my office’s upcoming events, including my next Town Hall on Saturday, January 25 from 12-1pm at @MTLSD High School Auditorium. #PA17 https://t.co/m11KD8eubz

In addition to visiting or calling one of my District Offices, we host mobile office hours each month & will be at Penn Hills Library on Wednesday, 1/15 from 10a-3p. #PA17 https://t.co/JFYbdw00VD https://t.co/KcfQTU9xZA

Join me for my next Town Hall on Saturday, January 25 at 12pm in the Auditorium at @MTLSD High School. Enter through doors A-2 located off of Cochran Road. #PA17 https://t.co/xHNSlpXCd6 https://t.co/spHP3X8lNJ

Today, top national security officials briefed members of Congress on the killing of Qasem Soleimani & rising tensions with Iran. The administration owes us an explanation of why things in the Middle East are getting worse. Read my full statement below: https://t.co/n2d9pAPKxV
Congratulations to the #PA17 winners of the 2019 @CongressionalAC from @shady_side. I look forward to seeing your app “Mathias” displayed in the U.S. Capitol this year. https://t.co/QfzctZ0nYA
